title: A&G's Kramer: Bull Market To Continue,  Stay Wary of Fed(Audio)
itunes:title: A&G's Kramer: Bull Market To Continue,  Stay Wary of Fed(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Hilary Kramer, President and Chief Investment Officer of A&G Capital, on the markets, 2Q earnings, and the Dow and S&P 500 setting new records.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
